Name: SEARCH ALL - SEASHELLS
About the game: SEARCH ALL - SEASHELLS is a game in the genre of 'hidden object', in which you need to find all the seashells on a large location drawn in the style of 'doodling'. The location shows an underwater city. In the foreground of the location are large corals and an underwater castle. Behind these objects there is a huge whale and three other unusual buildings. A submarine is floating in the background, carrying the collected cargo. From the animated graphic elements in the game there are algae, a submarine, lanterns, as well as air bubbles coming from the bottom. Periodically, a variety of jellyfish swim up and down. Key Features: - Animation elements on location; - 'Doodling' design style; - 80 seashells to find; - Pleasant soundtrack: - The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result.
